data.actual_result: The "User is typing" bar pops up without any names in it
data.expected_result: No bar pops up when you delete a line of text
data.short_description: "User is typing" bar pops up when nobody is typing
data.steps_to_repro: - Make sure you're in a channel where nobody is typing - Type enough text to where you have just over one line - Delete enough text to go back to one line - Observe the area where the "User is typing" bar would show
